subject: Re: Website Changes for Siva Chandrasekaran
preview: Hi Daniela,  No worries! We really appreciate your feedback.  Feel free to let us know if you need any further assistance—always happy to help.

full_threads.body:
Hi Daniela,

No worries! We really appreciate your feedback.

Feel free to let us know if you need any further assistance—always happy to help.

Looks great the way it is so probably no need to add another image. I'm really happy with the changes you have made!

Thank you.

Kind Regards

Daniela Haitas

Practice Manager

For Assoc/Prof Siva Chandrasekaran

Melbourne Orthopaedic and Trauma Institute

Appointments: 0385951800

Facsimile: 0386400692

Mobile: 0411274000

Email: admin@moati.com.au

Hi Daniela,

Appreciate your quick response.

Shall we add the image here? Check the link here.

Hi Joy,

I want to use this picture for knee non surgical please.



We do a lot of knee injections as a non-surgical option so prefer to use this picture for non-surgical knee please.

Kind Regards

Daniela Haitas

Practice Manager

For Assoc/Prof Siva Chandrasekaran

Melbourne Orthopaedic and Trauma Institute

Appointments: 0385951800

Facsimile: 0386400692

Mobile: 0411274000

Email: admin@moati.com.au
(Time: 40mins) Dev + Admin time

Hi Daniela,

Hope you have a lovely Friday!

We are happy to inform you that we've done the necessary updates for Moati website.

Just a quick note that we currently do not have a non-surgical image for Knee Pain.

Feel free to send when it's available. Let us know if you have any further queries.

Done updating the info in the "cost" tab in "Your Consultation" page as well as the location in "Knee Pain" page. Cache cleared and preloaded. Checked in incognito to make sure changes are live. (30 mins)

-Whil

Kind Regards

Daniela Haitas

Practice Manager

For Assoc/Prof Siva Chandrasekaran

Melbourne Orthopaedic and Trauma Institute

Appointments: 0385951800

Facsimile: 0386400692

Mobile: 0411274000

Email: admin@moati.com.au

Hi Joy,

Please see my answers below.

Thanks for your help.

Kind Regards

Daniela Haitas

Practice Manager

For Assoc/Prof Siva Chandrasekaran

Melbourne Orthopaedic and Trauma Institute

Appointments: 0385951800

Facsimile: 0386400692

Mobile: 0411274000

Email: admin@moati.com.au

Loom: https://www.loom.com/share/ca30552ea3e94a6785ab288e484545f4?sid=0951bdc0-dfb1-4ba8-97d6-00bd5f8f9364

Current section: “In your consultation”
Changes:
  • Update Initial Consultation text to:
    “There will be an out-of-pocket expense for consultation in the rooms. A new patient consultation is $250 with a Medicare rebate available.”
  • Update Follow-up Consultation text to:
    “A follow-up review is $150 with a Medicare rebate available.”

Procedure Section Updates

Change: Update fee details and remove The Alfred Hospital.
New text:
“There may be a known gap fee of $550 to $1100 depending on the procedure performed and your health fund benefits. Dr. Chandrasekaran’s staff will provide you with an itemised account for potential out-of-pocket costs and rebates for suggested surgical procedures.”
Add:
“If you elect to have your surgery in the public system, we can arrange this at no cost at Werribee Mercy Hospital, but there may be a waiting period for the procedure.”

Knee Pain / Locations Section - https://www.moati.com.au/knee-pain/

Current section: “Find a Location Near You” and “Knee Surgeon Melbourne, Malvern & Werribee | MOATI”
Changes:
  • Keep only Werribee and Malvern locations.
  • Remove all other hospitals and related contact details.
    Specifically, remove:
    • The Avenue Hospital (Windsor)
    • St Vincent’s Private Hospital (Fitzroy & East Melbourne)
    • Epworth Hospital (Richmond)
      Keep only:
    • Cabrini Private Hospital
      181–183 Wattletree Rd, Malvern VIC 3144
      (03) 9508 1222
    • St Vincent’s Private Hospital (Werribee Mercy Hospital)
      240 Hoppers Ln, Werribee VIC 3030
      (03) 9218 8000

✅ Summary of Tasks

  • Update consultation and follow-up fee information with Medicare rebate notes.
  • Revise procedure fee range and add public system info (Werribee Mercy).
  • Clean up “Find a Location” section to reflect only Werribee and Malvern.
  • Remove outdated hospital details and links.

Hi Daniela,

Happy Monday!

Just a quick update—we're currently working on your feedback.

We also want to confirm your requests below from the document:

  1. CAN WE CHANGE THE NON-SURGICAL PICTURE TO THE INJECTION OF THE KNEE UNDER THE KNEE TAB. 
    1. Is this for the Knee Pain page and this picture?
  2. DO YOU HAVE A HIP INJECTION PICTURE YOU CAN USE FOR NON-SURGICAL IN THE HIP TAB?
    1. Is this for the Hip Pain page?

Looking forward to your confirmation so we can proceed.

Hi Joy,

Thank you so much for your help.

Kind Regards

Daniela Haitas

Practice Manager

For Assoc/Prof Siva Chandrasekaran

Melbourne Orthopaedic and Trauma Institute

Appointments: 0385951800

Facsimile: 0386400692

Mobile: 0411274000

Email: admin@moati.com.au

Hi Daniela,

Thank you for your feedback regarding the website changes.

I'll have these checked by our team and let you know once we have an update.

action.text: Allie Borcena moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ inbox

full_threads.body:
Sorry also forgot to mention under knee pain still has down below in find a location near you Knee Surgeon Melbourne, Malvern & Werribee | MOATI Still has 6 operating locations so need to remove the 4 and just keep werribee and malvern please. Thank you for all your help! Kind Regards Daniela Haitas Practice Manager For Assoc/Prof Siva Chandrasekaran Melbourne Orthopaedic and Trauma Institute Appointments: 0385951800 Facsimile: 0386400692 Mobile: 0411274000 Email: admin@moati.com.au

I have made a few notes in the document. There are still a few things that need to be updated.

In your consultation the

Initial consultation changes to

There will be an out of pocket expense for consultation in the rooms. A new patient consultation is $250 with a Medicare rebate available.

Follow up change to

A follow up review is $150 with a Medicare rebate available.

Procedure (change the gap fees and remove The Alfred Hospital)

There may be a known gap fee of $550 to $1100 dollars depending on the procedure performed and your health fund benefits. Dr. Chandrasekaran's staff will provide you with an itemised account for potential out of pocket costs and rebates for suggested surgical procedures.

If you elective to have your surgery in the public system we can arrange this at no cost at Werribee Mercy Hospital but there may be a waiting period for the procedure.

Kind Regards

Daniela Haitas

Practice Manager

For Assoc/Prof Siva Chandrasekaran

Melbourne Orthopaedic and Trauma Institute

Appointments: 0385951800

Facsimile: 0386400692

Mobile: 0411274000

Email: admin@moati.com.au

For any further queries, feel free to let us know.

Thank you for your confirmation.

We’ll share this with our team and let you know once the Patient Registration Form page has been added to the menu and website button.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any other questions or requests.

I'm happy with whatever is easier for the patient to find or can we please do both if possible.
